channel.title: ServiceBus Supported Resources on Azure Service Operator
channel.description: Recent content in ServiceBus Supported Resources on Azure Service Operator

item.title: servicebus.azure.com/v1api20210101preview
item.description:
APIVersion

Value Description
“2021-01-01-preview”

Namespace

Generator information: - Generated from: /servicebus/resource-manager/Microsoft.ServiceBus/preview/2021-01-01-preview/namespace-preview.json - ARM URI: /​subscriptions/​{subscriptionId}/​resourceGroups/​{resourceGroupName}/​providers/​Microsoft.ServiceBus/namespaces/{namespaceName}

Used by: NamespaceList.

Property Description Type
metav1.TypeMeta
metav1.ObjectMeta
spec Namespace_Spec
Optional
status Namespace_STATUS
Optional

Namespace_Spec

Property Description Type
azureName The name of the resource in Azure. This is often the same as the name of the resource in Kubernetes but it doesn’t have to be. string
Optional
encryption Properties of BYOK Encryption description Encryption
Optional
identity Properties of BYOK Identity description Identity
Optional
location The Geo-location where the resource lives string
Required
operatorSpec The specification for configuring operator behavior. This field is interpreted by the operator and not passed directly to Azure NamespaceOperatorSpec
Optional
owner The owner of the resource. The owner controls where the resource goes when it is deployed. The owner also controls the resources lifecycle. When the owner is deleted the resource will also be deleted. Owner is expected to be a reference to a resources.azure.com/ResourceGroup resource genruntime.KnownResourceReference
Required
sku Properties of SKU SBSku
Optional
tags Resource tags map[string]string
Optional
zoneRedundant Enabling this property creates a Premium Service Bus Namespace in regions supported availability zones. bool
Optional

Namespace_STATUS

Property Description Type
conditions The observed state of the resource conditions.Condition[]
Optional
createdAt The time the namespace was created string
Optional
encryption Properties of BYOK Encryption description Encryption_STATUS
Optional
id Resource Id string
Optional
identity Properties of BYOK Identity description Identity_STATUS
Optional
location The Geo-location where the resource lives string
Optional
metricId Identifier for Azure Insights metrics string
Optional
name Resource name string
Optional
privateEndpointConnections List of private endpoint connections. PrivateEndpointConnection_STATUS[]
Optional
provisioningState Provisioning state of the namespace. string
Optional
serviceBusEndpoint Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations. string
Optional
sku Properties of SKU SBSku_STATUS
Optional
status Status of the namespace. string
Optional
systemData The system meta data relating to this resource. SystemData_STATUS
Optional
tags Resource tags map[string]string
Optional
type Resource type string
Optional
updatedAt The time the namespace was updated. string
Optional
zoneRedundant Enabling this property creates a Premium Service Bus Namespace in regions supported availability zones. bool
Optional

item.title: servicebus.azure.com/v1api20221001preview
item.description:
APIVersion

Value Description
“2022-10-01-preview”

Namespace

Generator information: - Generated from: /servicebus/resource-manager/Microsoft.ServiceBus/preview/2022-10-01-preview/namespace-preview.json - ARM URI: /​subscriptions/​{subscriptionId}/​resourceGroups/​{resourceGroupName}/​providers/​Microsoft.ServiceBus/namespaces/{namespaceName}

Used by: NamespaceList.

Property Description Type
metav1.TypeMeta
metav1.ObjectMeta
spec Namespace_Spec
Optional
status Namespace_STATUS
Optional

Namespace_Spec

Property Description Type
alternateName Alternate name for namespace string
Optional
azureName The name of the resource in Azure. This is often the same as the name of the resource in Kubernetes but it doesn’t have to be. string
Optional
disableLocalAuth This property disables SAS authentication for the Service Bus namespace. bool
Optional
encryption Properties of BYOK Encryption description Encryption
Optional
identity Properties of BYOK Identity description Identity
Optional
location The Geo-location where the resource lives string
Required
minimumTlsVersion The minimum TLS version for the cluster to support, e.g. ‘1.2’ SBNamespaceProperties_MinimumTlsVersion
Optional
operatorSpec The specification for configuring operator behavior. This field is interpreted by the operator and not passed directly to Azure NamespaceOperatorSpec
Optional
owner The owner of the resource. The owner controls where the resource goes when it is deployed. The owner also controls the resources lifecycle. When the owner is deleted the resource will also be deleted. Owner is expected to be a reference to a resources.azure.com/ResourceGroup resource genruntime.KnownResourceReference
Required
premiumMessagingPartitions The number of partitions of a Service Bus namespace. This property is only applicable to Premium SKU namespaces. The default value is 1 and possible values are 1, 2 and 4 int
Optional
publicNetworkAccess This determines if traffic is allowed over public network. By default it is enabled. SBNamespaceProperties_PublicNetworkAccess
Optional
sku Properties of SKU SBSku
Optional
tags Resource tags map[string]string
Optional
zoneRedundant Enabling this property creates a Premium Service Bus Namespace in regions supported availability zones. bool
Optional

Namespace_STATUS

Property Description Type
alternateName Alternate name for namespace string
Optional
conditions The observed state of the resource conditions.Condition[]
Optional
createdAt The time the namespace was created string
Optional
disableLocalAuth This property disables SAS authentication for the Service Bus namespace. bool
Optional
encryption Properties of BYOK Encryption description Encryption_STATUS
Optional
id Resource Id string
Optional
identity Properties of BYOK Identity description Identity_STATUS
Optional
location The Geo-location where the resource lives string
Optional
metricId Identifier for Azure Insights metrics string
Optional
minimumTlsVersion The minimum TLS version for the cluster to support, e.g. ‘1.2’ SBNamespaceProperties_MinimumTlsVersion_STATUS
Optional
name Resource name string
Optional
premiumMessagingPartitions The number of partitions of a Service Bus namespace. This property is only applicable to Premium SKU namespaces. The default value is 1 and possible values are 1, 2 and 4 int
Optional
privateEndpointConnections List of private endpoint connections. PrivateEndpointConnection_STATUS[]
Optional
provisioningState Provisioning state of the namespace. string
Optional
publicNetworkAccess This determines if traffic is allowed over public network. By default it is enabled. SBNamespaceProperties_PublicNetworkAccess_STATUS
Optional
serviceBusEndpoint Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations. string
Optional
sku Properties of SKU SBSku_STATUS
Optional
status Status of the namespace. string
Optional
systemData The system meta data relating to this resource. SystemData_STATUS
Optional
tags Resource tags map[string]string
Optional
type Resource type string
Optional
updatedAt The time the namespace was updated. string
Optional
zoneRedundant Enabling this property creates a Premium Service Bus Namespace in regions supported availability zones. bool
Optional
